info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
I enjoyed staying at this place. Very confortable. A view on the lake and good table to work. (There was even a second screen I could use). The residence is perfect for a single person that needs a working space and facilities to cook own food.
Thank you very much Beum Soo and thanks to the staff that was taking care of the residence.

His listing address is actually different. It is nowhere near to Gulshan lake. It is actually in road number 21 in Banani.
Actual room is totally different from the photograph in the listing.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · September 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The place is very central, clean, and the host is always helping when needed. Great value for this price!
Great place to stay, cook and other staff is very supportive and good.
Exceptional hospitality, fabulous location, sparkling clean interiors and a staff that is especially attentive. If I’m ever back in Dhaka, I won’t hesitate to stay here again.
The host is very kind and the accommodation is very neat. They came to a new place called Bangladesh and helped me a lot to adjust quickly.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Areum residence is a wonderfully peaceful oasis in Dhaka. The guest house is very clean, and the simple decor and light colors, and helpful and friendly staff make it the perfect place to work. The location too is wonderful, just a short walk to coffee shops, restaurants and shops in the Banani area. A high quality, delicious Korean breakfast is provided everyday. I would definitely stay here again.

Staying at James’s place: it wasn’t just that the description was completely accurate, entire home spotless, pick up and other services available as promised, what made James stand out was his genuine desire to go above and beyond expectations, making the short visit I had so easy and enjoyable. The location is fantastic, being only a quick tomtom or car ride to all the best places, yet still private and quiet enough to really relax and enjoy.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2018,  · Stayed a few nights
Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2018,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: I highly recommend James' place. While James was not in town, he was still always super responsive via text and always kindly checking in to make sure things were okay. His in-house staff of Malik, Sohel, and Lison are wonderful people! The apartment is super clean and comfortable. Cannot more highly recommend James' place!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2017,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Partially considering to feel Banani District in Dhaka, I luckily to find James' house via Airbnb. It is so nice to stay here-----clean, quiet and cozy apartment, beautiful views, delicious meals, music in morning and evening, pleasant talks...etc. Besides all of them, I hope to appreciate all of James' kind help in daily life and business. Highly recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2017,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Aruem Residence exceeded my expectation. It is much better than Pan Pacific Sonargaon where I normally stay. James offers free pick up and drop off from the airport (mind you I arrived at midnight and left at 3 am!). Breakfast is amazing and included in the price. Manik and Nixon diligently prepare dinners and lunches too at nominal prices ($7-9 per meal). They wash and iron clothes for free. The rooms are spacious and 2 out of 3 rooms have a good view over the lake. There is also a car rental service at competitive rates for travel. The location is very handy with a shopping mall within 0.5 km. There are several restaurants within walking distance including Thai, Chinese, Korean food. I found the place very safe. James has been an EXTREMELY helpful host. I had in fact lost my luggage and he took me to a mall to buy clothing! I will definitely be back to his place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2017,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Very lucky to find this house, nice landlord, nice cooker and very warm reception for whole 20days. It is strongly recommend good hotel and wish could have another chance to stay again.
